body: Story: Dude confessed to Girl. He gets rejected cuz girl has bf. Offers to take his virginity anyway. Why? Cuz the same thing happened to her when she was once rejected by the guy he liked. She gave her virginity to the guy who rejected him so she wanted to do the same for our main dude. After that one time, looks like they both consented for a round 2 in a hotel. At that point, it's no longer just the virginity talk. In the end scene, it turned out that they've done it 10 times now and seems like they're keeping that kind of body relationship.
Now we play the waiting game...
